Package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.exception

Class LambdaContainerException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
java.lang.RuntimeException
org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.exception.LambdaContainerException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@ClassVersion(sourceVersion="$Id: LambdaContainerException.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $") @API(status=STABLE, since="0.1.0") public final class LambdaContainerException extends RuntimeException

A "container" exception for exception thrown within lambda expressions.

Author:
Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
Version:
$Id: LambdaContainerException.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $
Since:
0.1.0

    The exception that is thrown when the container holds an unexpected exception.

      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • checkIfExpected

      public final boolean checkIfExpected(Stream<Class<? extends Exception>> expected)
      Checks whether the contained Exception is somehow expected.
      Parameters:
      expected - The expected exceptions.
      Returns:
      true if the contained Exception is among the list of expected exceptions, false otherwise.

    • checkIfExpected

      public final boolean checkIfExpected(Collection<Class<? extends Exception>> expected)
      Checks whether the contained Exception is somehow expected.
      Parameters:
      expected - The expected exceptions.
      Returns:
      true if the contained Exception is among the list of expected exceptions, false otherwise.

    • checkIfExpected

      @SafeVarargs public final boolean checkIfExpected(Class<? extends Exception>... expected)
      Checks whether the contained Exception is somehow expected.
      Parameters:
      expected - The expected exceptions.
      Returns:
      true if the contained Exception is among the list of expected exceptions, false otherwise.

    • getCheckedCause

      public final <T> T getCheckedCause(Class<T> exceptionType) throws RuntimeException
      Returns the contained Exception if it is of the given type; otherwise a RuntimeException is thrown.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The expected Exception type.
      Parameters:
      exceptionType - The expected type.
      Returns:
      The contained Exception.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - This is in fact an LambdaContainerException.UnexpectedException that is thrown when the contained Exception was not expected.
